subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Daniele Ratto of Italy withstood cold and rain in the Pyrenees to win the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España, while Vincenzo Nibali withstood rivals’ attacks to protect his overall lead.
snippet: Daniele Ratto of Italy withstood cold and rain in the Pyrenees to win the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España, while Vincenzo Nibali withstood rivals’ attacks to protect his overall lead.
